ValidationRule.description: IA Account must be checked as either National or Major.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR(AND( RecordTypeId="012F0000000qHdf", IsNationalAccount__c=FALSE, IsMajorAccount__c=FALSE),AND( RecordTypeId="012F0000000qHdf", IsNationalAccount__c=TRUE, IsMajorAccount__c=TRUE))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: IA Account must be checked as either National or Major.
